column1: Who all can add Videos to my Page?
column2: You can choose who all can add Videos to your Page while creating your Page, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Videos Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Page Details” link for your Page.

column1: How can I add a video to my Page?
column2:
You can add a Video to your Page in one of the following ways:
1. To upload a Video, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Page Profile.    
b. Click “Videos” tab on the page Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Videos”.
c. Click on “Add a Video” link from the top left corner of the “Videos” tab to add a video.
d. Fill up the form to add a video.
e. Select a video source and enter a Video Link (URL) of the video you want to add to the page.
f. Click on “Save Video”, to add a video to your Page.
 
2. From the “Apps” section of your Page Dashboard, click on the “Post a Video” button and follow the steps from ‘c’ to ‘f’ as in case 1 above.

column1: How many videos can I add to my Page?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Videos that you can add to your Page. You can add any number of Videos to your Page.

column1: From which all sources can I add Videos to my Page?
column2: You can add Videos to your Page by choosing the appropriate options for the  “Video Source” field. Currently, the available sources from which you can add videos are: Youtube, Vimeo and your hard-drive. The availability of video sources is conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.

column1: I want to search for a specific Page Video. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a Page Video using the detailed search box available in the “Videos” section under Page navigation.

column1: What are Sponsored Page Videos? How can Videos created on my Page be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored Page Videos are those Videos which have been created for Paid Pages. These Sponsored Videos will appear in the “Sponsored Videos” block in the “Videos” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Videos” for Page Videos and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for Page Videos also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Videos.
If your Page is created under a Paid Package, then the Videos created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid Page Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured Page Videos? Who can mark Videos for Pages as Featured?
column2:
Featured Page Videos are videos of Pages which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such videos are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured Page Videos appear in the “Featured Videos” slideshow in the “Videos” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Videos” for Page Videos and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for Page Videos also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Videos.
Page Videos can be made Featured only by our site administrators.

column1: I have a Page on this site. However, the Videos feature is not available for my Page. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Videos feature is not available for your Page could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your Page for which the Videos App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Videos App suits you. You can change the Package for your Page from the “Packages” section of your Page Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for Pages, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
